movies.title: BATMAN
movies.overview: Batman - The Dark Knight also known as Arkham Knight was released in 2005 with Batman Begins,Dark Knight and Dark Knight Rises.

movies.title: ROBIN
movies.overview: Robin is animated superhero movie followed by Batman.Damian Wayne is the character played in this movie.

movies.title: POISON IVY
movies.overview: Posion Ivy was one of the dangerous villian of Batman Arkham Knight. Watch her destroy Gotham with her poisonous plants.

movies.title: JOKER
movies.overview: Joker is the all time best villian of Batman. In Dark Knight ther was his first glimpse where he plays a hide and seek game with Batman.

movies.title: HARLEY QUEEN
movies.overview: Harley Queen is the girl of Gotham's dangerous criminal - The Joker, She however helps batman to catch Joker and his thugs in Injustice.

movies.title: ARKHAM KNIGHT
movies.overview: Arkham Knight is a warrior superhero,self designed to destroy Batman as he assumed that Batman was the reason that his parents diedm but later he joins forces with Batman.

movies.title: BANE
movies.overview: Bane the fastest active and smart villian for Batman shows in Dark Knight Rises where he activates the Time bomb to destroy Gotham but later Batman as always saves Gotham.

movies.title: NIGHT WING
movies.overview: Night Wing the best side kick for Batman, is no other than son of Batman and Talia al Ghul. He carries out the side mission for Batman and excels in Combat and Acrobatics.
